content: AG 500-11S Angle grinder Angle grinder with long-lasting carbon brush and side switch, for cutting and grinding with discs 4.5 up to 5 ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Grinders and sanders- - - ### FEATURES:Features Active Torque Control (ATC) stops the tool body from spinning uncontrolledly if the disc jams – helping to reduce a common safety hazard Hilti Smart Power technology automatically adjusts power output to suit the material being cut – delivering consistently high cutting performance and protecting the motor from overload Non-slip grip area on the back of the tool and soft-grip side handle for low vibration and maximum comfort Time-saving cutting and slitting (chasing) in widths up to 25 mm using two discs (with DC EX 125/5 accessories) Applications Cutting and grinding of mineral base material Cutting and grinding steel and other metals Cutting, grinding and finishing metal Cutting and grinding concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Disc diameter: 5 in Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 5.5 lb. Max. cutting depth: 1.34 in Technical Data | Disc diameter | 5 in | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 5.5 lb | Max. cutting depth | 1.34 in | No load RPM | gear 1: 11500 rpm | Trigger type | Constant on | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 94 dB (A) | 1 | Triaxial vibration value for angle grinding (ah,AG) | 5.3 m/s² | 2 | Disclaimer | Use specific guard depending on selected disc | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3564654 - AG 500-11S angle grinder - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x AG 500-11S 120V Angle grinder - 1x Wrench - 1x Threaded stud - 1x Comfort side handle - 1x inner Flange - 1x Outer Flange - 1x 125-P88 Protective cover assy - 1x 5 Clip-on front cover - 1x 5 grinding guard - 1x Kwik lock 5/8 - 11
